item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Egoless Engineering (323 points | 128 comments)
2. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (329 points | 507 comments)
3. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (82 points | 13 comments)
4. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (188 points | 62 comments)
5. The Tube Computer (136 points | 40 comments)
6. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (55 points | 10 comments)
7. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (41 points | 12 comments)
8. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (246 points | 41 comments)
9. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (287 points | 177 comments)
10. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (74 points | 25 comments)
11. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (13 points | 1 comment)
12. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (183 points | 172 comments)
13. Homography Explained with Code (11 points | discuss)
14. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (114 points | 106 comments)
15. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (109 points | 140 comments)
16. My brand new digitizing workflow using a 25 year old film scanner (82 points | 39 comments)
17. Information Batteries (2021) [pdf] (13 points | 1 comment)
18. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
19. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (35 points | 8 comments)
20. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D engine (175 points | 39 comments)
21. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (57 points | 19 comments)
22. A new home for Python-build-standalone (16 points | 4 comments)
23. Amazon Nova (270 points | 107 comments)
24. The Curse of Markdown (119 points | 94 comments)
25. Automated reasoning to remove LLM hallucinations (19 points | 12 comments)
26. On-scalp printing of personalized electroencephalography e-tattoos (43 points | 3 comments)
27. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (4 points | 2 comments)
28. California teacher dies from suspected rabid bat bite (77 points | 128 comments)
29. MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation (31 points | 3 comments)
30. Text Editing Hates You Too (2019) (102 points | 43 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
